name: Leave Me A Loan
description:
This game was coded and brought to life by Josh  Church, the art and dialogue was created by Jack Kinzig, and the idea for the game was thought of by Tucker Vanderwielen.

The premise behind the game is that you are trying to get  money from everyone in your neighborhood to pay off your debt.

The game and art was created over three hours. Then we added the start and end screen after the three hour mark, which took around twenty minutes.

Credit:

Background music:  RYYZN 

https://www.audiolibrary.com.co/ryyzn/superstar-instrumental

Plugin:  D'Dialogue System (learned it during this game jam, very intuitive)
